nodes.text: Gold Six was the call sign of the second member of Gold Squadron. There were a number of starfighter squadrons with this name, and several pilots went by the call sign Gold Six.
A Clone trooper pilot using the call sign Gold Six flew a V-19 Torrent starfighter during the Clone Wars.
Gold Six was the call sign of Hol Okand when he flew with Gold Squadron during the Battle of Yavin. Okand was killed in the assault against the first Death Star.
